mnd8:21.4: āveṭhiyaṃ → āvedhiyaṃ (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed), nibbeṭhiyaṃ → nibbedhiyaṃ (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
mnd8:26.2: pañhavimaṃsakāse → pañhavīmaṃsakā se (bj) | pañhavimaṃsakā ye (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mnd8:29.4: bhañjissāmī”ti, yā evarūpā → yo evarūpo (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mnd8:35.2: unnatiyā → uṇṇatiyā (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr), onatiyā → oṇatiyā (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
mnd8:40.3: So → so taṃ (bj), unnamatī ca → uṇṇamaticca (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed) | uṇṇamatī ca (mr)
